segments.text: My gaze is fixed on the adult woman in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her dress and apron, a typical domestic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But there's water pouring from the sink right beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing onto the counter and down onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the growing puddle, yet she shows no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely unaware of their immediate environment?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing, almost to the point of being frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of obliviousness is truly astounding to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She risks not only water damage but also a potential slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her calm demeanor while chaos brews around her is quite perplexing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself feeling quite irked by her complete lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to snap her out of this daze.
segments.speaker: PAR
